author: Kate Morris and Sally Brown
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Line a baking tray with greaseproof paper. Trim the end of the rosemary stalks to a point and remove most of the leaves. Thread a tomato, pepper piece and sausage onto a rosemary stalk. Repeat with the remaining ingredients and rosemary stalks. Put the kebabs onto the baking tray. Mix the honey and mustard together in a bowl, then brush the mixture onto the kebabs. Roast the kebabs for 18-20 minutes or until the sausages are cooked through.
ingredients: 4 long stalks fresh rosemary,  8 cherry tomatoes,  ¼ red pepper, cut into 2.5cm/1in pieces,  8 cocktail sausages,  1 tbsp runny honey,  1 tbsp wholegrain mustard
